scripts.attach: npm start && docker container exec -it tradebot tmux new-session -As tradebot "node index.js"
scripts.buildstart: npm run build && npm run start && npm run attach
scripts.rm: docker container stop tradebot && docker container rm tradebot || docker container rm tradebot
scripts.clean: npm run rm && docker volume rm tradebot_database || docker volume rm tradebot_database
